title: Sanskrit Tantra & Yoga Philosophy
description: The English transmission of Sanskrit Tantric texts through Arthur Avalon (John Woodroffe) and Haraprasada Shastri's manuscript editions, documenting the esoteric yoga and tantric traditions of India.
keyFigures: Arthur Avalon (John Woodroffe): Pioneering English translator of Tantric texts
Haraprasada Shastri: Critical editions of Bengali Tantric manuscripts
Gopinath Kaviraj: Commentary on yoga and tantra synthesis
researchValue: Foundational English-language sources for understanding Tantra. Woodroffe's translations made Tantric philosophy accessible to Western audiences and influenced the Theosophical Society and Western esotericism.
